The FAQ is very good and answers a lot of really good questions. I am
convi=
nced that new members of this list are not taking the time to click
on the =
link and go to the FAQ page and read it. Could new members be
sent two emai=
ls? The first would be the welcome to the group, feel the
lurve email and t=
he second would be a copy of the FAQ, which is not that
long and shouldn't =
blow most people out of the water.

Just my 1/50th of a U.S. Federal note. =
:-)

Simon
